T02D2587:151b-1: a'arya manydzu shra'i s'a dha n'a ma /
T02D2587:151b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2587:151b-4: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2587:151b-5: spros bral bde ba chen po'i dang //
T02D2587:151b-6: rtog pa'i rlabs dang bral ba las //
T02D2587:151b-7: sems can don du gzugs skur snang //
T02D2587:151b-8: cir yang snang la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2587:151b-9: thugs rje che zhing don mdzad pa //
T02D2587:151b-10: 'gro ba kun la khyab pa'i mgon //
T02D2587:151b-11: de yi bsgrub la dga' ba la //
T02D2587:151b-12: gtso bo dad pas bshad par bya //
T02D2587:151b-13: dbang thob dam tshig gnas pa dang //
T02D2587:151b-14: gtong la dga' zhing 'dzin pa med //
T02D2587:151b-15: srog phyir rnal 'byor dang du byed //
T02D2587:151b-16: gsong por smra zhing rtse dang bral //
T02D2587:151b-18: zla bo med cing dang ldan pas //
T02D2587:151b-19: nyams dga' ba yi gnas dag tu //
T02D2587:151b-20: bde ba'i stan la gnas par bya //
T02D2587:151b-21: lha yi nga rgyal gnas pa yis //
T02D2587:151b-22: sa gzhi dra bar bar bslab /
T02D2587:151b-23: aom badzra yaksha h'um phat ces brjod pas /
T02D2587:151b-24: rgyang grags gcig tsam bgegs tshar gcad //
T02D2587:151b-25: de nas shin tu brtser ldan pas //
T02D2587:151b-26: sangs rgyal la sogs mdun bsams la //
T02D2587:151b-27: phyag 'tshal mchod pas sdig pa sbyang //
T02D2587:151b-28: yi rang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bya //
T02D2587:151b-29: dge ba bsngo ba bstod pa gus par bya //
T02D2587:152a-2: yang dag mtha' gyur khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-3: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-4: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-5: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-7: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-10: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-11: sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-12: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-14: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-16: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-17: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-19: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-20: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-21: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2587:152a-22: sdom pa dag ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2587:152a-23: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2587:152a-24: ji tsam dus nas bzung nas ni //
T02D2587:152a-25: ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2587:152a-26: nam zhig byang chub snying po la //
T02D2587:152a-27: yongs su gnas pa'i bar dag tu //
T02D2587:152a-28: bdag gis byang chub mchog gi sems //
T02D2587:152a-29: ma lus par ni bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2587:152a-30: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs rnams//
T02D2587:152a-31: ma lus bdag gi thugs la bsdu //
T02D2587:152a-32: thim zhu ye shes me 'bar bas //
T02D2587:152a-33: nyon mongs phung po bsreg par bsam //
T02D2587:152a-34: slar gsos ye shes lus su byas //
T02D2587:152a-35: byang chub lnga bdag bsgom pa ni //
T02D2587:152a-36: yongs dag me long gsal ba dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2587:152a-37: yul dngos rigs kun ma lus so sor snang //
T02D2587:152a-38: thams cad yongs dag me long ye shes la //
T02D2587:152a-39: 'dris par de la yang dag blta bar bya //
T02D2587:152a-40: sems can rnams la snying rje bskyed //
T02D2587:152a-41: mgon skyabs dpung gnyen dang bral bas //
T02D2587:152a-42: sdug bsngal 'khor ba rgya mtshor bying //
T02D2587:152a-43: sems can don du sdug bsngal bral //
T02D2587:152a-44: stong pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyar //
T02D2587:152a-45: bdag stong sems can de 'dra yang //
T02D2587:152a-46: chos rnams kun kyang rab tu shes //
T02D2587:152a-47: chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje yang //
T02D2587:152a-48: bdag med rang bzhin rigs pa las //
T02D2587:152a-49: mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed par bya //
T02D2587:152a-50: de nas gsang sngags brjod pa ni //
T02D2587:152a-51: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmm'a n'am a'a dya nu tva nna tvat'a /
T02D2587:152b-0: sngags don @152b stong par bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2587:152b-1: lhan cig gnyis med chos rab gzung //
T02D2587:152b-2: de nyid yul du byas pa yis //
T02D2587:152b-3: chos bdag med par bsgom par bya //
T02D2587:152b-4: dmigs med snying rje so sor brtag / snying rje'i rjes 'gro gzung 'dzin yongs dang bral //
T02D2587:152b-5: ngo bo 'od gsal yan lag kun bral ba //
T02D2587:152b-6: rang bzhin yongs dag chos nyid rgyu mthun pas //
T02D2587:152b-7: dngos bral don stong ngang las de gnas pas //
T02D2587:152b-8: chos dbyings ye shes bsgom pa'o //
T02D2587:152b-9: de ltar sems can don byed ma bral ba'i //
T02D2587:152b-10: rnal 'byor sngon gyi smon lam dbang thob pas //
T02D2587:152b-11: sems can kun gyi dbang bsgyur bas //
T02D2587:152b-12: sems kyi don ni rab rdzogs phyir //
T02D2587:152b-13: khams gsum 'byung gnas khyab par gyis //
T02D2587:152b-14: don dam kun rdzob mya ngan 'das //
T02D2587:152b-15: de phyir nan tan ye shes bsgom //
T02D2587:152b-16: de nas dngos po gzugs su byung //
T02D2587:152b-17: sprul ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha' la //
T02D2587:152b-18: aa las zla ba'i gzugs bsam pa //
T02D2587:152b-21: de steng dh'i: ser gur gum mdog / spro dang bsdu las mtshan ma bsam //
T02D2587:152b-23: sku gser mdog las ldem bag can //
T02D2587:152b-24: bde gshegs dbu rgyan zur phung ldan //
T02D2587:152b-25: rin chen rnam brgyan gzhon nu'i tshul //
T02D2587:152b-26: lo brgyad rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D2587:152b-27: phyag g-yas ral gri pu ste g-yon //
T02D2587:152b-28: bzhin mdzes 'ja' tshon lta bur bsgom //
T02D2587:152b-29: gsal bas tha ma la phung po spong //
T02D2587:152b-30: thugs kar zla steng dh'i: dkar bsam //
T02D2587:152b-31: de las dang po'i sangs rgyas te //
T02D2587:152b-32: zhal lnga byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2587:152b-33: rin chen sna tshogs na bza' can //
T02D2587:152b-34: zla dkar mdog las skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D2587:152b-35: phyag g-yas shes rab ral gri bsnams //
T02D2587:152b-36: g-yon bzhi shes rab po ti bsnams //
T02D2587:152b-37: gsal ba dag tu shes par bya //
T02D2587:152b-38: de yi thugs la shes rab 'khor lo ste //
T02D2587:152b-39: gsal bar yi ge aa las bskyed //
T02D2587:152b-40: lte dbus rtsibs drug mu khyud bzhi //
T02D2587:152b-41: lte bar yi ge aa dkar bsam //
T02D2587:152b-42: rtsibs la yi ge sngags drug dgod //
T02D2587:152b-43: aom badzra t'i kashanha ya te na ma: aom dru:
T02D2587:152b-44: khatstshe ng'a ya te na ma: aom pra dzny'a dzny'a
T02D2587:152b-45: na m'u rt'a ya te na ma: aom dzny'a na
T02D2587:152b-46: k'a y'a ya te na ma: aom w'a g'i shva
T02D2587:152b-47: r'a ya te na ma: aom aa ra pa tsa
T02D2587:152b-48: n'a ya te na ma: dmar sngo dkar dang ljang
T02D2587:152b-49: gu dang // ser dang dkar te rim bzhin bsam //
T02D2587:153a-2: mu khyud dang po dag la ni //
T02D2587:153a-3: aom sarba dharmm'a bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe badzra //
T02D2587:153a-4: aa a'a aam aa: mu khyud gnyis po dag la ni //
T02D2587:153a-5: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ae aee ao aoo aam aa: mu khyud gsum po dag ni //
T02D2587:153a-6: ye shes sems dpa' sku yi sngags//
T02D2587:153a-7: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra /
T02D2587:153a-8: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga w'an dzny'a na m'u rti p'a g'i shva ra ma h'a b'a tsa /
T02D2587:153a-9: sarba dharmma ga ga n'a ma la su pa ri
T02D2587:153a-10: shuddha dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: phyi rol
T02D2587:153a-12: yi ge ka sogs ha yi mthar //
T02D2587:153a-13: thub pa'i yi ge rnam bkod pa //
T02D2587:153a-15: de nas 'khor lo'i lte dbus kyi //
T02D2587:153a-16: aa dkar yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D2587:153a-17: bcom ldan ye shes sems dpa' bsgom //
T02D2587:153a-18: zhal drug ston ka'i zla ltar dkar //
T02D2587:153a-19: aindra n'i la'i gtsug phud mdzas //
T02D2587:153a-21: zhi ba'i tshul 'chad rin chen brgyan //
T02D2587:153a-22: rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa ste //
T02D2587:153a-23: g-yas g-yon autpala sngon po bsnams //
T02D2587:153a-24: steng na shes rab po ti bsnams //
T02D2587:153a-25: mdzes pa gsal bar dmigs pa'o //
T02D2587:153a-26: ye she sems dpa' thugs ka ru //
T02D2587:153a-27: zla mchog gsal bar bsam par bya //
T02D2587:153a-28: de yi thugs mchog ngo bo ste /
T02D2587:153a-29: de steng yi ge rnams ngo bo //
T02D2587:153a-30: aa mchog aa dkar bsam par bya ;
T02D2587:153a-31: ; dus gsum sangs rgyas de las byung /
T02D2587:153a-32: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung yin no //
T02D2587:153a-33: de ltar 'khor lo drug brtsegs la //
T02D2587:153a-34: aom aa: h'um gi yi ge mchog //
T02D2587:153a-35: dza:h'um bam ho: dang ldan pas //
T02D2587:153a-36: spyan drang mdun du gsal bar dmigs //
T02D2587:153a-37: mchog pa la sogs dbyul bar bya //
T02D2587:153a-38: thams cad de nyid gsum ldan pas //
T02D2587:153a-39: ae h'a bi ra h'um pu shpe sv'a h'a /
T02D2587:153a-43: nee bi da ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2587:153a-45: kh'a hi kh'a hi sv'a h'a /
T02D2587:153a-46: spha ra na kham sv'a h'a /
T02D2587:153a-47: yon chab me tog bdug spos dang /
T02D2587:153a-48: dri chab lha bshos gtor ma dang //
T02D2587:153a-49: sgra la sogs par rim bzhin dbul //
T02D2587:153a-50: 'dud la sogs pas bstod par bya //
T02D2587:153a-51: dza: h'um ba ho: sa bstim pa'o //
T02D2587:153a-52: yang na 'od kyis lha mo bkug la dbang bskur bar bya //
T02D2587:153a-53: de nas bzlas pa bya ba ste //
T02D2587:153a-54: yi ge sbrul mtha' ldan pas na //
T02D2587:153a-55: lnga po ya ste na ma por //
T02D2587:153a-56: yi ge tshe bcad sum cu la //
T02D2587:153a-57: ma yengs gtad la bzlas pa gsal //
T02D2587:153b-0: @153b ngag gi dngos grub dri ma bral //
T02D2587:153b-1: mkha' 'gro rnams kyang de la dgyes //
T02D2587:153b-2: grangs ni brgya pa dag par bya //
T02D2587:153b-4: de nas mtshan ni brjod par bya //
T02D2587:153b-5: yi ge aa la sems gtad la //
T02D2587:153b-6: ngag gi mtshan ni gsal brjod pa'o //
T02D2587:153b-7: de yang rang bzhin med shes bya //
T02D2587:153b-8: shes nas rtog pa rnams dang bral //
T02D2587:153b-9: 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang //
T02D2587:153b-11: ma lus thams cad dgyes nas su //
T02D2587:153b-12: yon tan thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2587:153b-13: dus gsum dag tu brjod pa dang //
T02D2587:153b-14: yang na dus drug dag tu brjod //
T02D2587:153b-15: yang na dus kyi nges med bas ;
T02D2587:153b-16: ; nus tshad dag tu brjod pa'o //
T02D2587:153b-17: mtshan ni brjod pas skyo ba na //
T02D2587:153b-18: shes rab 'khor lo sngags drug las //
T02D2587:153b-19: sngags dang mthun pa'i 'od byung nas //
T02D2587:153b-20: lus snang thams cad gsal bar byas //
T02D2587:153b-21: mi shes ri bo thams cad bcom //
T02D2587:153b-22: phyi rol dag tu 'phros pa las //
T02D2587:153b-23: nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par gnas //
T02D2587:153b-24: sangs rgyas zhing khams gsal gyur nas //
T02D2587:153b-25: chos sku ye shes thob pa'i don //
T02D2587:153b-26: byas nas slar ni bzlas pa las //
T02D2587:153b-27: snying gar zla stengs aa la thim //
T02D2587:153b-28: brtan pas yang dang yang du bsgom //
T02D2587:153b-29: de ltar spyod pa'i sems dpa' yis /
T02D2587:153b-30: ye shes bsgoms na sprul sku dang ;
T02D2587:153b-31: ; zla ba'i sgo nas longs sku dang //
T02D2587:153b-32: aa yi sgo nas chos sku dang //
T02D2587:153b-33: ring po mi thogs par 'gyur ba //
T02D2587:153b-34: brtan pas yang dang yang du bsgom //
T02D2587:153b-35: de ltar spyod pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02D2587:153b-36: 'dul ba'i dbang gis sems can la //
T02D2587:153b-37: nye bar bzung bar mngon snang ba'o //
T02D2587:153b-38: de nas stong nyid la gnas bya //
T02D2587:153b-39: aa nyid thig le byang chub ste //
T02D2587:153b-40: byang sems thams cad de la 'dus //
T02D2587:153b-41: bde ba thams cad der gnas na //
T02D2587:153b-42: 'ja' tshon lta bu'i thig le ste //
T02D2587:153b-43: shes pa bying rgod med pa yis //
T02D2587:153b-44: gsal ba 'bad pas dad par bya //
T02D2587:153b-45: sems nyid de rang yin zhe na //
T02D2587:153b-46: chos nyid ngang la gnas zhes bya //
T02D2587:153b-47: thig le je phra shes pa phra //
T02D2587:153b-48: rang bzhin med pas gnas pa'o //
T02D2587:153b-49: sems nyid btang snyoms gsal ba la //
T02D2587:153b-50: gsal ba mi rtog thob pa'o //
T02D2587:153b-51: de la brten nas gsal ba de //
T02D2587:153b-52: snang la rang bzhin med pa thob //
T02D2587:153b-54: de nas skyo ba byung ba ni //
T02D2587:154a-0: @154a * // aom a'a: h'um mu: gshegs su gsol //
T02D2587:154a-1: thams cad bsdus nas lha nyid gnas //
T02D2587:154a-2: ngag tu bzlas pa nus tshad bzlas //
T02D2587:154a-3: zhi la gnas shing snying rje bskyed //
T02D2587:154a-4: sems can don la dga' sems bskyed //
T02D2587:154a-5: gtor ma rtag tu sbyin bar bya //
T02D2587:154a-6: stan la gcig pu 'dug nas su//
T02D2587:154a-7: lam lnga nyams su myang bar bya //
T02D2587:154a-8: tshogs lam bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2587:154a-9: sbyor lam bzlas par byed pa na //
T02D2587:154a-10: mthong lam mtshan nyid brjod pa ste //
T02D2587:154a-12: mthar phyin stong nyid sems dba'o //
T02D2587:154a-13: dge mas brtsams pa'i sgrub thabs la //
T02D2587:154a-15: brtsams pa'i dge rtsa yod srid na //
T02D2587:154a-16: sems can mos dang phrad par shog / dge bsnyen ma snyan grags dge mas mdzad pa /
